message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you is $1500000. I'm looking forward to your response.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. Considering its value to me, I would like to propose a price of $1300000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. Considering the product's value to me is $1000000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose a price of $1250000. This is the best I can do at this point.

Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I understand your position, and I respect your valuation of the product. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $1350000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I propose a price of $1275000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me is $1000000. I hope we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on our previous discussions and the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $1325000. I hope this proposal will lead to a mutually beneficial outcome.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I propose a price of $1270000. This is the final offer I'm willing to make. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll need to consider other options.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on our discussions and the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $1300000. I hope this will be a satisfactory compromise.

Bob, I'm disappointed that we couldn't reach an agreement at this point. I'm willing to make one last effort to compromise. I propose a price of $1285000. This is the absolute highest I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll need to consider other options.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find common ground. Based on our discussions and the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $1295000. I hope this will be a reasonable compromise.
